Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Pdi2 (Api-like PrAMPs, natural AMPs-like, Pro-rich, UCLL1; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (90%) toPdi1P: 40%; R: 20%. GRAVY: -1.76, mol Wt: 2281.7; mol formula: C102H170N36O23; mol ex coeff: 0.Activity: active against E. coli BL21 (MIC 0.25 uM) and K. pneumoniae AR-0112 (MIC 2-8 uM) in 33% TSB and RPMI/serum. Warning:  non-standard assay. other bacteria not tested.
